title: Understanding BSR - Low Content Book Publishing

tactics.name: bsr_sales_estimation
tactics.description: Use BSR to estimate daily/monthly sales volume
steps: Use DS Amazon Quick few plugin to check BSR
Input BSR into calculator to estimate sales
caveats: BSR calculator provides averages, not exact figures
source_quotes: the higher this number the less books you're selling the lower this number the more books you're selling

heuristics.name: low_bsr_boost
heuristics.condition: If BSR is below 50000 then boost
source_quotes: the lower this number the more books you're selling

claims.statement: BSR is a metric that indicates book popularity on Amazon
source_quotes: BSR is a best sellers rank and you can find that just here

claims.statement: Books without sales do not display BSR
source_quotes: if you've published quite a lot of books and your books don't have BSR it's because no one has purchased that book

niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Creates highly targeted niches with limited competition
source_quotes: if you have started low content book publishing but you're not making that many sales then come and check out the course
